Name: GyroBlade
About the game: A 2D vertical scrolling simple shooter with retro-style pixel art. There are 8 stages in total. Weapons are only main shots, and you can power up to 5 levels by taking items. Classic mode power-ups are 2 levels. Shot types are available in straight and wide. You can choose the difficulty level from hard, normal, easy, and classic.
